name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time to Live - Visualize Your Life in Weeks

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that replaces the New Tab page and displays how much of your life has elapsed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TTL (Time to Live) is a powerful and thought-provoking Chrome extension that aims to help you visualize your life in weeks, so you can stay focused on what truly matters. By providing a unique and personalized perspective on time, this extension encourages you to seize the day and make every moment count.

Key Features:

1. Age & Time Progress: Track your age in years and the progress within the current week, providing a sense of urgency to make the most of your time.
2. Customizable Appearance: Choose from various color themes including an option for random color selection. The extension also supports both light and dark modes to match your preferences.
3. Adjustable Year Labels: Customize the frequency of year labels displayed on the grid, with options to hide or show them at specific intervals (1, 2, 5, or 10 years).
4. Responsive Design: The grid automatically adjusts to your screen size and browser window, ensuring a seamless user experience across devices.

TTL serves as a constant reminder that our time on this Earth is limited. By visualizing your life in weeks, you'll gain a renewed appreciation for the preciousness of each moment, inspiring you to live with purpose and make the most of the time you have.

Install TTL today and transform the way you perceive and use your time!
